Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.collaborativespace

Class CSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcmsplugin.collaborativespace.CSManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jalios.jcms.db.DBConstants, CSConstants
    public class CSManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jalios.jcms.db.DBConstants, CSConstants
    The CollaborativeSpace manager singleton.
    Since:
    csp-3
    Author:
    Olivier Dedieu <olivier.dedieu@jalios.com>, Sylvain DEVAUX <sylvain.devaux@jalios.com>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CSManager.MemberCollaborativeSpaceSelector
      Filters only on opened, and not model CollaborativeSpaces, which member belongs to.
      static class  CSManager.MemberOtherCollaborativeSpaceSelector
      Filters only on opened, and not model CollaborativeSpaces, which member does not belong to, and which he can see.

      Check if given Member can access given CS analytics.
      To do so, the member is either CS admin, or has the Workspace Reporting > Usage analysis ACL in the given space, or has the global Reporting > JCMS Analytics ACL.

      • isTypology

        public boolean isTypology​(com.jalios.jcms.Category category,
                          boolean includeTypologyRoot)
        Returns true if Category is a Typology.

        This means :

        • Typology root exists, and is defined (See getTypologyRoot())
        • Category has Typology root as an ancestor, or is the Typology root itself
        Parameters:
        category - the Category to test
        includeTypologyRoot - if true, consider the Typology Root Category as a Typology .
        Returns:
        true if it is a Typology
        Since:
        csp-4.3, csp-5.1

        public boolean canRequestCSCreation​(com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember,
                                    boolean checkDataWrite)

        It is true if :
        • CSRequest has a storage workspace defined (See virtual property $id.CSRequest.workspace)
        • CSRequest type is enabled in storage workspace
        • Member is stored
        • data writes are enabled given checkDataWrite boolean

        checkDataWrite - if true, also tests that data writes are enabled
        Returns:

      • canManageCSMembers

        public boolean canManageCSMembers​(com.jalios.jcms.Member member,
                                  com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws)
        Member can manage CS members, if :
        • he is admin of given Workspace
        • or, he has global "Members" ACL and he belongs to the space
        • or, he has Workspace "Members" ACL (thus, he belongs to the space)
        Parameters:
        member - the member to check
        ws - the workspace to manage members
        Returns:
        true if member can manage CS members

        csp-4.1

        public boolean canManageCSSettings​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.Member member,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws)
        Check if given Member can manage CS settings (see canManageCSSettings(Member, Workspace)), and the given request has the attribute EDIT_SETTINGS_REQUEST_FLAG.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to check a custom attribute
        member - the member to check
        ws - the workspace to manage settings
        Returns:
        true if member can manage CS settings for this request
        Since:
        csp-4.1

      • canManageCSSettings

        public boolean canManageCSSettings​(com.jalios.jcms.Member member,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws)
        Check if given Member can manage given CS settings.

        Member must:

        • either be a space administrator
        • or have CSConstants.ACL_WS_SETTINGS ACL in the given space
        • or have AccessControlConstants.WORKSPACE_ADMIN_RESOURCE ACL in the given space
        Parameters:
        member - the member to check
        ws - the workspace to manage settings
        Returns:
        true if member can manage CS settings
        Since:
        csp-4.1

      • canAccessCSAnalytics

        public boolean canAccessCSAnalytics​(com.jalios.jcms.Member member,
                                    com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws)
        Check if given Member can access given CS analytics.
        To do so, the member is either CS admin, or has the Workspace Reporting > Usage analysis ACL in the given space, or has the global Reporting > JCMS Analytics ACL.
        Parameters:
        member - the member to check
        ws - the workspace to access the analytics.
        Returns:
        true if member can access the workspace analytics.
        Since:
        csp-5

      • getCSTree

        public CSNode getCSTree​(com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace workspace,
                        com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace parentWorkspace,
                        int level,
                        int maxLevel,
                        com.jalios.jcms.DataSelector csSelector,
                        java.util.Comparator<com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace> comparator)
        A convenient method to compute a Tree of CollaborativeSpace.
        Parameters:
        workspace - the root CollaborativeSpace's workspace.
        parentWorkspace - an optional parent CollaborativeSpace's workspace.
        level - the current depth level.
        maxLevel - max depth to compute.
        csSelector - an optional DataSelector to filter CollaborativeSpaces.
        comparator - an optional comparator of Workspace.
        Returns:
        a TreeNode representing the CS hierarchy.
        Since:
        csp-4.3, csp-5.0

      • canAccessCSContent

        public boolean canAccessCSContent​(generated.CollaborativeSpace cs,
                                  com.jalios.jcms.Member member)
        Convenient method to determine if a Member should have access to a given CollaborativeSpace's contents. The given member can access the CS content only if :
        • the cs is public
        • or the member is not null and belongs to the cs (private and secret cases)
        Parameters:
        cs - the collaborative space to test.
        member - the member asking access.
        Returns:
        true if access to Workspace's contents is granted.
        Since:
        csp-4.3

      • getAccessibleSubWorkspaceSet

        public java.util.Set<com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace> getAccessibleSubWorkspaceSet​(com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws,
                                                                                       com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                                                                       boolean includeParentWs)
        Return the sub (descendant) Workspaces Set of the given workspace.
        An optional Member can be passed to retain only workspaces he can navigate into.
        If member is null, only the public CollaborativeSpace's workspaces will be returned.
        Parameters:
        ws - the parent workspace to get the visible sub workspaces.
        mbr - an optional member.
        includeParentWs - weither to include parent or not.
        Returns:
        a Set of Workspaces.
        Since:
        csp-4.3

        Implementation: member is added to the space's followersGroup.

        Returns:

      • unfollow

        public boolean unfollow​(generated.CollaborativeSpace cs,
                        com.jalios.jcms.Member loggedMember)
        Make given member to unfollow the given space.

        Implementation: member is removed from the space's followersGroup.

        Parameters:
        cs - the space the member wants to unfollow
        loggedMember - the logged member
        Returns:
        true if unfollow has been done
        Since:
        csp-6.4

      • getDataImage

        public java.lang.String getDataImage​(generated.CollaborativeSpace cs,
                                     java.lang.String userLang)
        Finds the best representative image for given space.

        In order of preference :

        • portlet image
        • declared typology image (if typology has no read rights)
        • parent typology image (if no read rights)
        • header image
        • then, fallback on the default visual
        Parameters:
        cs - the space
        userLang - the userLang
        Returns:
        the best representative image for this space
        Since:
        csp-7.0

        Retrieved members are those: enabled, and with usage Account.

        Does not include leaders nor guests.
